1.content:
The Efdar family were an upper class family who lived in Savannah, Georgia.

One day, they decide to hire help to look after the family mansion. Charles picked up the phone. "Hello? Yes, I'd like to hire help, someone who will look after our mansion-make beds, dust, etc..."

"Certainly sir! How frequent would you like to schedule it?"

"Weekly, please!"

"Our cost is $250.00 a session. And how will you be paying, sir?"

"Oh, I will pay the help directly!"

"Excellent! What is the address?

"509 Parkest Street, on the east side of Savannah. You can't miss it, it's the mansion in between the two lamp posts at the end of the cul-de sac!"

"Wonderful! We will send someone over this Thursday! Pleasure doing business with you! "

info.brief_description: Shrinking story! You're hired to a strange rich woman, whose household is quite hellish..
info.description:
You're hired by a rich couple, to maintain their household and to watch after their twin children. You have your suspicions about the sexy mother, and soon find out (the hard way) that the entire family is comprised of sex-craved demons!

You can be male or female, and pretty much anything goes. I mean anything. I want to see vore, cock vore, transformation, unbirthing, mouthplay, underaged whatever you want, incest--EVERYTHING.

The family has reality-bending abilities which they use to shrink you, and do whatever else they want really..


The Mother, in her 40's, named Evelyn, has long black hair and deep brown eyes, full lips that smirk in amusement.. a sultry woman, who enjoys the power she employs over her tiny victims.

The Father, also in his 40's, named Charles, has dark hair and dark eyes, often busy with work. Takes his time when he plays with his new houseworker, likes to savor the suffering.

The Twins, both 7
Lance, a manipulative little kid, likes to get his way, knows how to frighten a little victim.
Beryl, a quiet little girl, listens to Lance and is protected by him, much gentler but still enjoys toying with victims.

Let the good times roll.
